author: ekoneil
msg: Work in the core controls test infrastructure to:
- more loosely copule the various test tools
- add inheritAll="false" to a bunch of <ant> calls in controls/test/build.xml so that it's easier to understand the dependencies between test components

msg: Add a Forrest documentation template with the correct DTD references and skeleton content to be used when creating new Beehive doc pages.
